query.statement: SELECT * FROM TableWithAllDataTypesView WHERE ([TableWithAllDataTypes_String] = @stringProperty OR @stringProperty IS NULL) AND ([TableWithAllDataTypes_Byte] >= @bytePropertyFrom OR @bytePropertyFrom IS NULL) AND ([TableWithAllDataTypes_Byte] <= @bytePropertyTo OR @bytePropertyTo IS NULL) AND [TableWithAllDataTypes_Enum] = @enumProperty AND ([TableWithAllDataTypes_Date] >= @datePropertyFrom OR @datePropertyFrom IS NULL) AND ([TableWithAllDataTypes_Date] <= @datePropertyTo OR @datePropertyTo IS NULL) AND ([TableWithAllDataTypes_DateTime] >= @dateTimePropertyFrom OR @dateTimePropertyFrom IS NULL) AND ([TableWithAllDataTypes_DateTime] <= @dateTimePropertyTo OR @dateTimePropertyTo IS NULL);
